attributes.action: Make residents aware of HMO's housing illegal migrants
attributes.additional_details: Residents are aware of which hotels are housing illegal migrants but illegal migrants are secretly being housed in HMO's amongst legal UK citizens. Some of these undocumented migrants may be criminals, rapists or even terrorists and families will be worried about their women and children and the safety of the UK. They should be made publicly known so as local residents can keep an eye on any untoward activity from their occupants.
attributes.background: Make local residents aware of which houses of multiple occupancy are housing illegal/irregular migrants.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We are not sure who specifically should be informed of this, and who would be obliged to inform people of this. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
